plan_analysis:
The pre-research materials already give (a) today’s reference close, (b) a statistically-sound unconditional and conditional 9-day base rate for DD, and (c) a snapshot of current fundamentals plus a couple of recent news bullets.  
What’s still missing for a well-rounded forecast:

1. Finer-grained historical patterns that could matter now:  
   • DD’s typical price action around ex-dividend dates (the ex-dividend is 2026-03-02, exactly our reference day).  
   • Seasonality for the Materials/Chemicals space in early-March.  
   • DD’s beta/ correlation to the S&P 500 to translate any macro view into a DD view.  
   • Performance during macro data weeks that will hit before resolution (e.g., CPI on Mar-10)—these can move cyclicals/materials.

2. Clarification of the resolution source/mechanism is already covered (Yahoo Finance close).

3. Current catalysts/risks between now and Mar-13:  
   • Fresh analyst rating/target changes, especially straight after the earnings season.  
   • Any new corporate actions, contract wins/losses, litigation, or regulatory headlines.  
   • Options market pricing (implied vol and skew) for the Mar-13 weekly expiration, which contains traders’ aggregate probability beliefs.  
   • Sector-wide flows or macro shocks (e.g., commodity price swings, Fed commentary, geopolitics).

4. Contrarian checks: look for negative headlines (lawsuits, downgrades) or broad-market risk-off signals that could cause a short-term drop.

The eight queries below are designed to fill those gaps: five historical-oriented to enrich the reference class, and three current-oriented to surface fresh catalysts and market sentiment.

queries_planned.intent: quantify how DD usually behaves in the first 5-10 trading days after going ex-dividend.
cross-check/extend the 9-day base-rate stats already provided.
find studies or data on early-March seasonal returns for materials/chemicals stocks.
obtain DD’s historical beta and correlation stats to gauge sensitivity to overall market moves before Mar-13.

queries_planned.query: Over 2010-2025 analyze DD price change 3 days before and 5 days after each monthly US CPI release; compare with non-CPI weeks for positive-return probability.
queries_planned.intent: see if CPI-week volatility skews the 9-day outcome, relevant because Feb CPI prints on Mar-10.
surface any upgrades/downgrades or target changes issued after Feb-29.
retrieve option chain/implied move for the weekly options expiring Mar-13 to gauge market-implied probability of price rise.

queries_planned.query: Coverage of DuPont de Nemours contracts, litigation, or management commentary February-March 2026, North America and Europe
queries_planned.intent: catch any breaking corporate or regulatory developments that could swing the stock within the forecast window.
